textual data analysis

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: TXM is a free and open-source cross-platform Unicode & XML based text/corpus analysis environment and graphical client, supporting Windows, Linux and Mac OS X. It can also be used online as a J2EE standard compliant web portal (GWT based) with access control built in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: ENS de Lyon - CNRS, ICAR Laboratory
Université de Franche-Compté, laboratoire ELLIADD (Edition, Littératures, Langages, Informatique, Arts, Didactique, Discours)
